settings.description: Ready to personalize your wellness journey? Take our quick, oncologist-designed quiz to get started.

custom_css: @media (max-width: 768px) {.hero__content__wrapper {grid-row-start: 2; grid-column-start: 1; --text: #333333; padding: 20px 10px; } a {background: #295135; color: #fff; } a:hover {background: #295135; color: #fff; border-color: transparent; }}

settings.title: Expert Formulated, Survivor Specific
settings.subheading_content: Developed by oncologists, pharmacists, and naturopaths to focus on cancer survivors specific wellness goals and needs.*
settings.content: Our products are the result of thousands of hours spent by experts from various fields, researching and selecting ingredients scientifically shown to benefit the overall wellness of cancer survivors. Each chosen ingredient is specifically meant to promote your health now and in the long-term.*

settings.title: Science Meets Tradition
settings.subheading_content: Supplements integrating cutting-edge Western science with research-proven Eastern healing ingredients.*
settings.content: Our products combine the best of both worlds, bringing together the latest scientific advancements and time-tested traditional remedies. Natural ingredients have been benefiting people for centuries - we didn't invent them - but we rigorously analyze them through scientific research and verified studies ensuring that each ingredient we use is proven to be beneficial, not just a fad.*

settings.title: Superior Quality, Optimal Dosing
settings.subheading_content: High-concentration, premium ingredients formulated for optimal bioavailability, achieving full potency with fewer pills.*
settings.content: We did our quality homework so you don't have to. Our USA based manufacturing plants adhere to the highest quality control standards, similar to those used in the production of prescription medications. We only source from verified suppliers and rigorously test all ingredients at several stages of the process. We don’t market blends with hidden dosing or ingredients. What we say is in our pills is in our pills—nothing less, nothing more.*

settings.title: Survivorship Simplified
settings.subheading_content: Convenient daily routine with AM/PM packets. Everything survivors want and nothing they don’t need.*
settings.content: Say goodbye to the hassle of multiple pill bottles! Start an easy-to-remember routine with our carefully curated AM/PM packets, designed to include supplements that boost each other’s absorption, are taken at the right time of day, and in the right daily doses. All meant to maximize bioavailability, absorption, and benefits to you!*

settings.text_content: *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
